word_mean: 可行手术的：可相当安全地接受手术的病人

sentence.Network_en: When will the single currency be operable?

sentence.Network_en: Its features are normative, qualificative, operable, inheritable and changeable.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin operabilis, from Latin operari 'expend labour on' (see operate)

means.word_mean: 1. capable of being treated by surgical operation;
2. fit or ready for use or service;

sentences.sentence: "the toaster was still functional even after being dropped"
"the lawnmower is a bit rusty but still usable"
"the dishwasher is now in working order"

stems_affixes.word_buile: oper工作+able能……的→能工作[操作,手术]的
operation操作+al……的→adj.操作的, 运作的
co共同+operation操作→共同操作→合作
oper工作+a→通过工作[创作]而来

stems_affixes.value_cn: 操作,运转,开动,起作用,动手术
